entities.name: rookwood
entities.description: Rookwood is a man who used to work in the department and is now cowering on the floor. He has pockmarked face with scars visible in the candlelight.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is speaking to Rookwood in a cold, cruel voice. He seems to be trembling and is standing over Rookwood.

entities.name: avery
entities.description: Avery told Harry that Bode would be able to remove something.

entities.name: bode
entities.description: Bode is mentioned as someone who fought against Malfoy's Imperius Curse and could not have taken something.

relationships.description: Harry is speaking to Rookwood in a cold, cruel voice.
Avery told Harry that Bode would be able to remove something.
Bode fought against Malfoy's Imperius Curse.
Harry relinquished his grip on the chair to stand over Rookwood.
Harry asked Rookwood if he was sure of his facts.
